infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: PhomoCam uses your camera to take photos that you can share with friends. Parties, Concerts, Events shared instantly from your camera.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Allow PhomoCam to access your microphone for taking videos with audio
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Allow PhomoCam to access your photo library so you can sync photos or choose a profile photo
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Allow PhomoCam to save photos to your photo library and create a PhomoCam album
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: PhomoCam does not access your location. This permission is required by underlying frameworks but is not used by the app.
infoPlist.NSUserNotificationUsageDescription: Allow PhomoCam to send you notifications about shared photos and friend activities
